programme.title: Retirement Adjustments and Startups
programme.desc: "Adjusting personal expenses in retirement, retiring to another country; launching a new business. Also: economist Michael Porter (Harvard) on competition in the financial world and government regulation."

programme.title: Risks Threaten Retirement. Rewire Your Plans
programme.desc: "Tariffs, inflation, healthcare costs... how do you shift from saving to spending in retirement while managing risks like these? Jamie Hopkins is a CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER professional, an attorney, and best-selling author of Find Your Freedom and Rewirement: Rewiring the Way You Think About Retirement. He returns to the show , today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 525 with Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA to share insights on how to rewire your retirement plans. Plus, how should Fred and Ginger in Huntington Beach, California, pay for repairs on their rental properties? How can Peter Lemonjello manage taxes in his early retirement with 72(t) elections, rental income, and an installment sale? Can Calvin and Susie in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, buy an $800,000 beach house - and should they?"

programme.title: Will the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act Be Extended
programme.desc: "Will your taxes go up? Stay the same? Go down, even? Jeffrey Levine is Chief Planning Officer at Focus Partners, Professor of Practice in Taxation at the American College of Financial Services, and the Lead Financial Planning Nerd at Kitces.com. In other words, hes one of the savviest tax minds in the country. Jeff returns to the show today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast number 524 with Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA, with his thoughts on what will happen to taxes under the new administration, saving for retirement in a Roth IRA vs. a traditional IRA, managing inherited retirement accounts, and the future viability of Social Security. Plus, what should you do with required minimum distributions when you dont need the money to live on? How do you calculate the maximum amount you should convert from your retirement account to a tax-free Roth account, and how much should you convert - or not - to keep RMDs under control? Finally, how can minor beneficiaries avoid probate?"

programme.title: How To Make 279 000 000 By Being A Little Snitch
programme.desc: "The SEC just paid TWO HUNDRED AND SEVENTY-NINE MILLION DOLLARS to ONE person for their role as a whistle-blower on successfully enforced corporate fraud. Here is how you can do the same thing The two hundred and seventy-nine million dollar award more than doubled the one hundred and fourteen million dollar reward that the SEC issued in October of 2020. In total their whistle blower rewards program has paid out over a billion dollars since it was established in 2010. The best part is because the Dodd-Frank Act protects the confidentiality of whistle-blowers and informants no additional information is known about the people who have received these life changing payouts. The securities and exchange commission actually recognises in their press releases that these payouts have added up to a lot of money that could have been given back to the victims of financial crime. But there is three good reasons that [despite the spiralling costs] the SEC has kept the program and actually doubled down on promoting it with payout leader boards and flashy announcements every time a big payout is made. You get the feeling that if it wasnt for the informant privacy laws they would present a novelty size check in front of the press like the whistle-blowers just won the Powerball. But they cant so if you decide that you like the idea of a completely anonymous multi-million-dollar payday I will also tell you the steps that you need to take to become a successful snitch. The first reason that the SEC has set up this program is that its very hard to collect evidence on the white-collar crime they go after. Insider trading hurts regular investors but if the insiders are careful about their communications channels, they can make it almost impossible to collect evidence even with full time surveillance. The SEC admits that a significant amount of clearly illegal activity goes undetected or unpunished. Independent investigations have estimated that only about 15 of financial crimes are ever detected and even fewer are enforced. Nobody know

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: From Adaptive Intelligence to Decentralized Skies at Korea Blockchain Week 2025
programme.desc: Live from Korea Blockchain Week 2025, join us at The Edge of Show as we explore how blockchain and AI are redefining the next frontier of technology and real-world innovation. Host Josh Kriger sits down with Shaw Walters, Founder of Eliza Labs, to unpack the concept of Adaptive Intelligence, a new approach to merging AI and crypto through agent-to-agent economies, generative token networks, and autonomous systems that learn from user behavior. Then Robin Wingardh, co-founder of Wingbits, shares how his team is decentralizing flight tracking data, partnering with major airlines, and building a blockchain network that rewards contributors worldwide. A deep dive into how AI, data, and decentralization are merging to transform industries—from autonomous agents to global aviation.

programme.title: Spotlight - Eden Energy
programme.desc:
Join EDEN as they step on stage with a simple message. With EDEN waste will power the future.
EDEN systems convert mixed carbon based waste into: • clean electricity • clean fuels • bio and hydrochar for soil • recoverable grey water
Waste is no longer a liability, it is now an asset. The solution to pollution is here and EDEN will be restored.

programme.title: XRP MAJOR INSTITUTIONS BUYING NOW! 2028 BULL MARKET PREDICTION

programme.title: Memecoins on Bitcoin!
programme.desc: What if trading Bitcoin memecoins was as easy as logging in with your wallet and clicking “go”? This week, we’re pleased to welcome Bob Bodily, CEO of Toniq Labs, to discuss the platform that’s turning that vision into reality. No gas fees, no headaches, just fast and simple memecoin creation and trading that could change the game for all memecoins. From the Internet Computer to Bitcoin, Toniq Labs has been pushing boundaries in decentralization and on-chain innovation. If you want to see the future of digital assets, this is the episode.

programme.desc: Neville Rumble (Ian Hencher) is an obsessiveman. When he meets Lucy(Alex Lochrie) at a people skills training course he becomes infatuated. He is left devastated and deeply depressedwhen she leaves town. Three years later, in a chance meeting, Neville sees Lucy again. But she iswith her fianc (Gavin Fowler). As time passes the seesaw of power shifts and things start to go badly wrong for Neville.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 40
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula… How???

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: LEMONAIDING THE ENEMY
programme.desc: Feeling sorry for Mark, the Ninjas throw him a bone. This almost backfires, however, when he unexpectedly returns accompanied by Durian and a gang of chumplings.

programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: MONKEY KALARI
programme.desc: A Kalari Gurukkal does a demonstration outside the Chai shop and suddenly the hotel has a massive swell of customers jostling in. Chai Raja is thrilled at the sudden pile of customers as tea glasses and snacks fly off the counter and even the flies are shooed off their hangout for lack of space. The extra publicity is great and Chai Raja sends out a complimentary snack plate with Sundar to the Kalari Guru- Basha planning to swipe a few complimentary snacks himself follows Sundar but then stops short as he sees the high leaps and stunts of the Gurukkal suddenly Basha is extremely interested in learning the art. (Basha sees the kalari moves as a easy way to out-of reach snack shelves). He approaches the teacher, but the latter is a stern man and is not easily coaxed. Basha tries buttering up the Gurukkal- at first the lazy Sundar doesnt clue in but when he realizes that Basha plans to use the Kalari moves to chomp away the fries kept for the customers. Sundar decides (thought bubbles) to master the art himself and beat Basha before he can succeed. Now the Kalari Guru has two very-very interested/undesired disciples who are intent on learning- or not letting the other one learn- Kalari! Add to this the fact that Chai Raja is losing his cool thanks to Sundar neglecting the customers and his job for the sake of the lessons. Sundar has to dash off for a bit and Basha creates his own Kalari moves. Its no time for monkeying but will Sundar realize that before its too late?

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: HYPNO-TACO
programme.desc: A new taco stand that has abruptly popped up overnight next to the tea shop. Strangely, though the tacos smell anything but tasty, the customers flock to it and Chai Raja sends Sundar to deal with matters. But that compounds the disaster as Sundar too turns his back at Chai Raja and starts guarding/waiting at the Taco stand with double his usual smartness! Though this gives Basha full freedom to raid the banana fries at the tea shop, Chai Rajas long face tugs at this heartstrings and Basha nips over to the taco stand to take a look at things. Thats when he realizes that the taco stand owner is in fact a rogue hypnotist from Bashas old circus who is literally hypnotizing the customers and Sundar to munch his Mexican lunch! Cracking his knuckles in glee, Basha sets about driving the rogue out of his mind and business. But a hypnotized Sunder is more powerful than ever, and Basha get whacked here and there in the ordeal. At last Basha gives a nice knock on Sundars head and he is back at the tea shop and Basha and Sundar together makes sure that the taco shop-owner runs for his dear life, much to Chai Rajas relief.

programme.title: Mouse Chase
programme.desc: A small mouse is very scared and just escaped from Hoodie and his gang to now hide in the house. Well from the pan into the fire as he realizes that Cat is worst then Hoodie.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: Trolly Troll arrives in Smightyland, but her big size scares everyone except Leila. Leila befriends the gentle giant and when Sneevil creates his Mecha-Sneevil Machine and tries to destroy everything, its Trolly Trolls bigness that helps save the day.

programme.title: Pirates Ahoy!
programme.desc: Nardy is afraid to swim and Dude tries to teach him, but Nardy just doesnt seem to get it. It all comes together though when the Villains dressed as pirates steal the Water Stone. Nardy has to dive in and face his fears to save the day.

programme.title: Drive On
programme.desc: They are both wearing goggles, and Lucky sports a scarf too. Buzz waves a checkered flag and theyre off! Buck and Lucky are wide eyed as they start zigzagging past the book racks, screaming, sliding around corners, and driving on 2 wheels.They spin the tires and speed off again, only to find Finkle dead ahead with his mop.They spin the tires and speed off again, only to find Finkle dead ahead with his mop.They drive around her in circles making her spin. As she stands there dizzy they head straight for her desk.

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: SMART YOGURT
programme.desc: Niya unwittingly falls for Durian Grey’s latest ploy; Dojo infiltrating yoghurt chumplings.

programme.title: Brother Sun and Sister Moon
programme.desc: Late night, GoGo and I-Go wait for their mother who’s at the market selling rice cakes. Meanwhile, her mother gets eaten by a tiger whom disguises as her mother and makes his way to the siblings.

programme.title: DOGGONE DAY
programme.desc: Things are normal at Hotel California- and just as crazy- as Chai Raja serves up teas and Sundar tries to keep the frisky Basha at bay. But then turns up a hulk of a man who is brusque and curt- yet Chai Raja is impressed as he seems to be ex-military. However, Sundars accidentally trips on the mans kit which is burstingwith dog-catching equipment. Freaking out, Sundar tries all zany disguises so that the dogcatcher doesnt figure out that he is in fact a dog- which would have probably worked....if not for dependably wily Basha. The monkey repeatedly botches up Sundars attempts as Chai Raja scratches his head trying to figure out when he had hired such a plethora of ill-dressed waiters and where in chais name, was Sundar?! The dog catcher ultimately sniffs out Sundars existence and eagerly tries to nab him. In an unusual show of affection, Chai Raja refuses to hand over Sundar. But the dog catcher is stubborn and lurks around laying traps. Basha helps by purposely leading Sundar toward the traps. It would have been his last day at the shop for Sundar, but for Basha accidentally setting off a trap too early and the dogcatcher getting caught in one of his own traps. As the medics haul him off and Basha pouts, Sundar chuckles and starts swabbing the floor with gusto.

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: Recess
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: CHOR MACHAYE SHOR
programme.desc: Chai Raja is down with fever and needs to rest. He gives Sundar the charge of the tea stall on 2 conditions; one, he will make sure the customers get their orders on time and second he mustnt be disturbed. Basha overhears it and is enthralled. Sundar is ready for the assignment and so is Basha. Hapless Sundar has to struggle and juggle himself between his hungry customers, his sleeping master and fighting the villain of his life-BASHA.

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Ene
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: APPRENTICE ALERT
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in his inventive mood and rigging up a new treat for his customers. In streak Basha chased by Sundar and the two mess around the kitchen while Chai Raja has stepped out for a second. As he tosses stuff to keep Sundar at bay, Basha accidentally makes a couple of special jalebis. Chai Raja steps back in and the two freeze mid-motion. Chai Raja scoops out the simmering jalebis and sniffs, his nose wrinkling. Sundar eagerly points at Basha sure that the monkey is sure to get in trouble this time, but much to his chagrin, Basha is hired- as an apprentice!! As Sundar glumly waits at the tables, Basha (the show-off) not only builds an acrobatic rapport with Chai Raja and makes life miserable for Sundar, but also manages to gobble up fries on the sly. Sundar has to find some means of getting Basha fired and tries to sneak in and mess with Bashas batter. But he ends up only making it better and earning Basha more pats on his back. The MP arrives and Chai Raja wants to show off his new apprentices skills Basha is in the spotlight and sure to crack under the heat. Sundar, meanwhile ready to be rid of Basha in any manner possible, sticks dynamite in the batter. Basha, stumped as to what to cook , hastily shapes up the batter into an inviting cake. Seeing a wick, the MP lights it- and slices...KABOOM! Both Basha and Sundar, trod with heavy shoulders out the tea stall as a charred Chai Raja signals they are fired.

programme.title: Double Role
programme.desc: ‘Ting tong’ .. Cat opens the door to sees a milk bowl at the door step. He slurps it up and ‘ZAP’ a Cat clone is formed.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: A Star Is Jumped
programme.desc: Odessa learns to leap over stars by starting on low ones,Persistence pays off, especially when you learn from each step along the way, building up to the final goal.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: The Bear and the Honey Jar
programme.desc: Dunky has just scolded Cat from trying to steal the cookies jar ,he then packs the lid on a big honey jar and places it on the kitchen shelf next to the cookie jar and warns Cat from stealing anything. .

programme.title: A Whole New Ballgame
programme.desc: The Moon in the Zooniverse has fallen from the sky and Odessa and the Zoonicorns must get it back to where it belongs. Sharing can be fun. Never give up.

programme.title: Lend A Helping Stare
programme.desc: Odessa gets into a staring contest with a Stareoffolous and needs to ask for help...but refuses to. You can do it, but sometimes you need to think about what help you need to get to the next step and ask for that help.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: GOOD CROC, BAD CROC!
programme.desc: The Guardians enjoy a baby croc until it grows into an unmanageable mutant sent by Negu. They’ll need to train the croc, and then return it to the island Negu stole it from.

programme.title: The Controllator
programme.desc: Everyone has forgotten April’s birthday, so when a stranger gives her a present, she’s delighted to accept it. It’s one of Negu’s inventions, which makes her do things against her will. When April, controlled by Negu, manages to steal the Glove of the North, Pai and Xia prove that they had remembered her birthday really, and get April to remove the device that’s control her.

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: Just A Day’s Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: Bad Wolf_Based On Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of The Three Little Pigs. There, the story ended some time ago. The WOLF burnt his bum trying to get in down the chimney, and the LITTLE PIGS were saved thanks to their house made of bricks. But, though some time has now passed, the ELDEST LITTLE PIG continues to forbid his brothers from leaving the house, out of fear of the WOLF. The MIDDLE and YOUNGEST LITLE PIGS are fed up and are convinced that the WOLF has changed and is now a good wolf. SANDRA and FO must discover the truth, by investigating the WOLF, who now appears to be a model citizen, a vegetarian whose hobby is DIY. Nothing is what it seems.

programme.title: Moon Charmer
programme.desc: Samir the local snake charmer is trying unsuccessfully to charm a snake out of his basket and the market is growing restless until Jamillah arrives and all of the market is in awe! When she explains where she comes from Samir is thrilled and asks her to accompany him to see a rare astrological site, a blood moon. But its a sight best seen from above and the greatest viewing spots are outside the city gates which are locked at night not to mention the law expressly forbidding anyone to leave. When they try to leave via a secret door a guard catches them, but just when all hope seems lost Jamillah has an idea - the magic carpet! And with that they take off into a night sky filled with a big red moon.

programme.title: GIVEAWAY
programme.desc: The Elders assign lots of chores to the Guardians. To get them to mellow out, Pai prepares a special dish. They become so mellow they start giving away all their possessions. Seeing an opportunity, Negu sends his henchmen to ask for the Glove of the North. Koto and Amkko fail, so Negu sends Mei and the Mutant Raccoon in disguise. The Mutant Raccoon ends up smashing himself in the face with the nunchucks given to Pai by the Elders.

programme.title: Maroon
programme.desc: When Kala tells Gummy and Harry that her favourite color is maroon, the pair decide to give her an ‘all maroon’ birthday surprise – but they soon learn that there can sometimes be ‘too much of a good thing’.

programme.title: You Don’t Say
programme.desc: PANCAKE and ODESSA’S friendship is strained when the young otter unknowingly offends Odessa. In the Zooniverse, Pancake learns a lesson when he and the Zoonicorns picnic in Echo Canyon where hurtful words which turn into irritating little creatures, Words can hurt.

programme.title: Giants And Bigheads
programme.desc: Fred volunteers his friends to work on the school parade as a scheme to get them a day off of school.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Bark or Bleat
programme.desc: When Gummy brings home a weird looking Goat home thinking that it is a Dog, Harry has a mad time convincing him otherwise. But what Gummy does not know is that he is in for a surprise.

programme.title: Top Turtle
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Duda Buddy
programme.desc: Duda thinks the Scottie Buddy is pretty awesome and asks Scot if he could go for a ride. Scot flatly refuses, so Duda is determined to make a Scottie Buddy of his own. Realizing that it is difficult to make one, Duda returns to Scot hoping for some help. Scot agrees to help Duda if he becomes his assistant. But Duda ends up causing more chaos instead of being helpful. Scot sends him off with a box of old parts and tells him to make his own Duda Buddy. Surprisingly, Duda manages to build a decent replica. Meanwhile, Scot discovers that his new wheel is not suitable for Scottie Buddy and wants him to return his old wheel to Duda...

programme.title: Surprise Day Off
programme.desc: When all the teachers at school are mysteriously absent one day, Fred initially cheerleads his classmates to celebrate. Brains figures out they have been taken away by the potato-brained Potatoids, and she and Fred go off to rescue them.

programme.title: The Forbbiden Room – Bluebeard
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the mysterious story of BLUEBEARD, having been called out by two MUSKETEERS, the brothers of MARIE, BLUEBEARD’s latest wife. The brothers have to leave on an urgent mission and they cannot visit their newly-married sister. The MUSKETEERS ask SANDRA to investigate their brother-in-law, as they do not trust him. After the MUSKETEERS have left, SANDRA realises the true magnitude of the problem. In the story, it is the MUSKETEERS who save MARIE, just when BLUEBEARD is about to finish her off. If SANDRA and FO do not intervene immediately, MARIÉ will be a goner.

programme.title: Royal Egg – Ugly Duckling
programme.desc: Everybody knows the story of the UGLY DUCKLING: the adventures and misadventures of a little swan that is born far from his family and is mocked and rejected by everyone. But nobody knows how the swan’s egg ended up in a duck’s nest. In this episode, SANDRA and FO have to resolve this mystery, having been called out by the parents of the UGLY DUCKLING, two swans who are the KING and QUEEEN of the birds. SANDRA will manage to thwart a plot to kill the “Ugly Duckling”, the prince of birds.

programme.title: Science Unfair
programme.desc: Fred is not prepared to enter the school science fair, but at the last minute, he transforms Friday into a glove that dispenses soda from the fingers. He wins! Soon he learns though that the fair was an effort to find someone with small enough hands to blast into space and rescue the stranded Astronaut, and Brains’ hero, Caribou Caruthers.

programme.title: Om Thum - The Wild Party
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the tale of TOM THUMB, having been called out by his brothers and sisters. Once there, SANDRA soon realises that they have arrived after the happy end of the tale. TOM THUMBs family is now living comfortably thanks to the treasure he stole from the OGRE, and the tiny hero is working as the royal postman, thanks to his "Seven-League Boots". But TOM THUMB’s brothers and sisters are very worried. Four days ago, the little postman set off to deliver a royal letter and he hasn’t returned. The worst thing is that, in order to reach his destination, TOM THUMB had to go through the sinister forest where the OGRE lives. SANDRA and FO go there and discover that TOM THUMB has again been captured by the OGRE and the OGRE and his wife have invited all the other ogres to a party to celebrate this.

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: The Incredible Shrinking Gummy.
programme.desc: A weird gizmo in Granny Peters’ lab winds up shrinking Gummy down to a tiny size, and he must cope with a suddenly-HUGE world... while trying to contact pals Harry and Kala and figure out some way to get back to normal.

programme.title: I Need A Cleaning Fairy
programme.desc: Scot invents a new machine called the Cleaning Fairy. Its an amazing invention that cleans everything by itself, but it does have a slight crease. It doesnt know when to stop and is so powerful that it can fly objects as large as a camping car. Meanwhile, Dada entrusts Pinkar to Caber when he goes out to look for deer. But Duda appears with a ball and Pinkar becomes a mess of mud. Duda discovers Scots Cleaning Fairy and puts him to work. Everything seems to be going well until the invention takes off and takes Pinkar to heaven. Duda, Caber and Scot chase after him, and to their horror they notice that the Cleaning Fairy is slowly losing her power, meaning that Pinkar could end up crashing to the ground. Just then, Dada shows up and doesnt look happy...

programme.title: Super Thomas
programme.desc: Fred gives Thomas the chance to feel like his idol, a comic book hero in a flying metal suit.

programme.title: Dolphin Tales
programme.desc: Dunky has taken a small picnic bag and takes Keet to the lake. A nice day as by the lake very peaceful. Keet sees two dolphins in the lake and plays with them as they get friendly with each other. The prowling Cat is not too happy. And tries various antics to catch Keet with funny results. The dolphins become good friends with Keet and teach Cat a lesson to remember for a longtime

programme.title: The Guide’s Servant – Ali Baba
programme.desc: On this occasion, SANDRA and her crazy assistant FO travel into the story of ALI BABA AND THE FORTY THIEVES, having been called out by ALI BABA’S WIFE. A week ago, ALI went to the forest to cut wood and he still hasnt returned. The detective and her assistant go into the cave of the 40 thieves and discover that AALI BABA has been taken prisoner, condemned to clean their enormous treasure for the rest of his days. SANDRA and FO release ALI, but before they have time to escape the THIEVES return to their cave. The detective leads ALI BABA and her assistant on a perilous journey through the bowels of the earth, following the enigmatic tracks of an ancient traveller, the sailor AL IDRISI.

programme.title: Mi vida ajena
programme.desc: Olga sufre un accidente y en el hospital se entera de que sobrevivió solo porque tomó el asiento equivocado.

programme.title: A un paso del paraíso
programme.desc: La familia Potapov ha ganado el premio mayor de la lotería, pero nunca había sido tan infeliz como ahora.

programme.title: A un paso del paraíso
programme.desc: La familia Potapov ha ganado el premio mayor de la lotería, pero nunca había sido tan infeliz como ahora.

programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Rowat Al Tareekh

programme.desc: A political talk show critiquing specific ideas and key figures in the political intellectual arena in a direct and subtle satirical style.

programme.title: The Weekend Show
programme.desc: The Weekend Show

programme.title: El Zalem Wel Mazloom
programme.desc: Director: Hossam El Din Mostafa - Cast: Nour El Sherif / Elham Shahin - Year of production: 1993

programme.title: Klashnkouf
programme.desc: Director: Rami Emam - Cast: Mohamed Ragb / Gada Adel - Year of production: 2009

programme.title: Sayed El Atefi
programme.desc: Director: Ali Ragab - Cast: Tamer Hossni / Abla Kamel / Nour - Year of production: 2005

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: 20 Days

As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales 8
programme.desc: The Spooktacular series, Incredible Tales featuring the paranormal encounters of ordinary people, returns for an 8th installment.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

They take him home, where Casper frightens their mother. Casper is again upset because he believes that he will always scare away his potential buddies. However, Casper scares away a banker who is coming to foreclose on the woman's house, and this wins her heart for Casper.

programme.title: Popeye's 20th Anniversary 1954

When called on to make a speech, he instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto.

programme.title: spooking about africa 2 (1080)

programme.title: Felix Goes A-Hunting-1923
programme.desc: A wife throws her husband out of the house, telling him not to return unless he brings her a fur coat. Deciding that the only way he'll get one is to make his own, he grabs his rifle and goes hunting. All his efforts fail, though, until he meets Felix, who offers to help him shoot rabbits, and impresses the man with his marksmanship skills. However, it turns out that shooting the rabbits isn't quite as easy as they thought it would be.

programme.title: Tramp, Tramp, Tramp the Boys Are Marching-1924
By Word of Mouse 1954
programme.desc: A foreign mouse comes to America and is amazed by its economic system. He goes to a mouse professor who explains how it works while they are being chased by Sylvester.

programme.title: Pepe le-Pew - Heaven Scent 1956
programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. The dogs, on seeing her stripe, run away and hide in fright. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pepe Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and tries to make love to her.

programme.title: Jumpin' Jupiter 1955
programme.desc: Porky and Sylvester's desert campground is sliced away and towed into outer space by a green, bird-like Jupiterian searching for earthly animal life. But Porky remains blissfully unaware, leaving Sylvester to be terrorized by the alien.

programme.title: My Favorite Duck 1942
programme.desc: Porky tries to relax on a hunting and fishing trip, but Daffy, smugly pointing out the "No Duck Hunting" signs, subjects him to constant irritation. Then the "Duck Hunting Season Open" signs start going up.

programme.title: Assault and Flattery 1956
programme.desc: Bluto is accusing Popeye in judge Wimpy's courtroom. Bluto tells a sad tale of how Popeye attacked him without provocation, but Popeye tells his side, in detail (in other words, a large chunk of _Balmy Swami, A (1949)_)

programme.title: Plane Dumb-1932
programme.desc: After crash landing in Africa, Tom and Jerry masquerade as Africans in a futile attempt to adapt to a strange environment.

programme.title: Betty Boop with Henry the Funniest Living American-1935
programme.desc: Henry, comic strip character, gets a job at Betty Boop's pet store

programme.title: The Flying Deuces 1939
programme.desc: Ollie has fallen in love with the innkeeper's daughter in Paris. The only problem - she's very much in love with her husband. To forget her he joins the Foreign Legion with Stan. Bad idea.

programme.title: Charlie Chaplin's A Busy Day-1 914
programme.desc: A jealous wife is chasing her unfaithful husband during a parade, after he starts to flirt with a pretty woman

programme.title: My Favorite Brunette 1947
programme.desc: Shortly before his execution on the death row in San Quentin, amateur sleuth and baby photographer Ronnie Jackson, tells reporters how he got there

programme.title: His New Job -915
programme.desc: Charlie is trying to get a job in a movie. After causing difficulty on the set, he is told to help the carpenter. When one of the actors doesn't show, Charlie is given a chance to act but instead enters a dice game. When he does finally act, he ruins the scene, wrecks the set, and tears the skirt from the star.

programme.title: Managed Money 1934
programme.desc: Young Mary Lou tries to help her brother Sonny raise money so that he can attend a military academy

programme.title: See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The latest sports that you may have missed!

Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
Stories. of the Century S2E12 Jack Slade
programme.desc: Railroad $25,000 payroll is stolen. Matt and Margaret investigate

programme.title: Stories of the Century S1E20 The Wild Bunch of Wyoming
programme.desc: Butch Cassidy is presented as a jovial type against killing as the leader of the notorious Wild Bunch. Matt and Frankie go after the outlaws when bank notes appear with phony signatures, trailing Butch all the way to South America.

programme.title: The Apache Kid's Escape 1930
programme.desc: Staying one step ahead of the law, the Apache Kid helps out a cowboy in trouble

programme.title: Stories of the Century S1E17 Henry Plummer
programme.desc: Plummer is the corrupt sheriff of Bannack, Montana in 1863-64 and runs a criminal gang as a source of wealth. When another stage is robbed, Matt and Frankie arrive to find out who is behind the crime spree responsible for over 100 deaths

programme.title: Stories... of the Century S2E4 Kate Bender
programme.desc: Young Charles Ward has disappeared while traveling in Kansas leading detectives Matt and Margaret to discover why. The local sheriff reports others missing and they all stayed with Kate Bender. An investigation leads to a grim discovery and deadly justice for the Benders

programme.title: The San Antonio Kid 1944
programme.desc: Red Ryder tries to expose murderous crooks who are terrorizing ranchers into selling their land because they contain secret oil-rich deposits.

programme.title: Stories. of the Century S1E23 Black Jack Ketchum
programme.desc: Black Jack Ketchum is a wanted outlaw in two countries leading him to lie low at the Cullen Ranch in 1890's New Mexico. Matt and Frankie head to the area to stop the gang's activities and save young Eddie Cullen from a hangman's noose

programme.title: Saul and David 1964
programme.desc: In Saul and David, the epic struggle of faith, jealousy, and destiny unfolds on the grand scale of biblical history. When humble shepherd David rises to fame after defeating Goliath, he becomes a loyal servant to King Saul. But as David’s popularity grows, Saul’s envy turns to fury, sparking a tragic conflict between king and chosen heir. With sweeping battles, powerful drama, and timeless themes of loyalty and betrayal, this historical epic brings one of the Bible’s most gripping stories to life.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas 1968
programme.desc: In The Night Before Christmas, the timeless holiday poem springs to life in a colorful animated retelling. As children nestle in their beds on Christmas Eve, Saint Nicholas arrives with his sleigh full of toys, spreading joy and wonder with every step. With warm narration, festive music, and charming animation, this family favorite captures the magic and spirit of Clement Clarke Moore’s classic tale, making it a cherished Christmas tradition on screen.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol 1951
programme.desc: In A Christmas Carol, Alastair Sim delivers a definitive performance as Ebenezer Scrooge, the miser whose icy heart is thawed by a haunting Christmas Eve journey. Visited by the ghost of Jacob Marley and the three Spirits of Christmas, Scrooge is forced to confront his past, witness the struggles of the present, and glimpse the bleak future awaiting him if he does not change. With atmospheric direction, powerful performances, and a timeless message of redemption, this beloved adaptation brings Charles Dickens’ classic tale to life in unforgettable fashion.

programme.desc: Join host and skull artist Jana Waller as she takes viewers on hunting and fishing adventures across the globe, featuring breathtaking scenery and incredible wildlife.

programme.title: Wilderness Bruins
programme.desc: Join host and skull artist Jana Waller as she takes viewers on hunting and fishing adventures across the globe, featuring breathtaking scenery and incredible wildlife.

programme.title: The Last Chance
programme.desc: Escaping a Nazi prison train in war-torn Italy, an American and a British soldier set out for the Swiss border and find themselves leading a multi-national party of refugees for the Italian underground.

programme.title: The Hurricane Express
programme.desc: When his father is killed in a train wreck, Larry Baker vows to unmask a mysterious criminal called "The Wrecker," who has targeted the L&M Railroad for deadly" accidents."

programme.title: Affairs Of Cappy Ricks
programme.desc: Cappy Ricks, a crusty old sea captain, returns home from a long voyage to discover that his family and his business are in chaos--his daughter is set to marry a nitwit that he can't stand, and his future mother-in-law has taken over everything and is set to merge his business with that of a rival company.

programme.title: Bells of Rosarita
programme.desc: Sue Farnum inherits a circus, but her dead father's partner is trying to take it away from her. Roy and Bob Nolan are filming a movie on location at the circus. They and a number of other western movie stars come to Sue's aid, putting on a show and catching the bad guys.

programme.title: Stormy Trails
programme.desc: A rancher caught in the middle of a bank robbery shoots one of the robbers. However, the dead bandit turns out to be a former ranch hand who was suing him. The rancher is arrested for murder.

programme.title: Dead for a Dollar
programme.desc: A famed bounty hunter runs into his sworn enemy, a professional gambler and outlaw that he had sent to prison years before.

programme.title: Massacre Time 1966
programme.desc: In Massacre Time, Franco Nero blazes onto the Spaghetti Western scene as Tom Corbett, a drifter who returns home to find his family’s land stolen and his brother living in ruin. Together, the two face a ruthless tyrant and his sadistic son who rule with terror and bloodshed. Directed by Lucio Fulci, this violent, gripping tale delivers brutal gunfights, raw emotion, and the relentless pursuit of vengeance.

programme.title: The Fatal Hour Starring Boris Karloff
programme.desc: When Captain Street's best friend Dan Grady is murdered, Street receives help from Chinese detective James Lee Wong and local newspaper reporter Bobbie Logan.

programme.title: It Takes A Thief
programme.desc: A gang leader dumps her criminal boyfriend when he is convicted of robbery, but he recovers the stolen loot once he's released. In retaliation, the gang kidnaps his son and demands the money as ransom.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson must protect a Swiss inventor of an advanced bomb sight from falling into German hands.

programme.title: Dragon Fist
programme.desc: Tong Huo-wan seeks redress from the man responsible for his master's death, but becomes entangled in a feud between a local clan and gangsters.

programme.title: The Guy with the Secret Kung Fu
programme.desc: Two Ming patriots spend their days helping the weak and rescuing damsels in distress. This alum gets them in trouble, though, as they are captured and then volunteered to go after the fearsome Dragon Gang, a tribe of bandits that have been terrorizing the land

programme.title: Drunken Tai Chi
programme.desc: A spoiled young man - on the run from a ruthless killer - hooks up with a puppeteer and his wife who are masters of the art of tai chi; the only style that can defeat the killer.

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Stef Iracet & Zeta Bosio
programme.desc: La luna llena ilumina Miami y el rooftop del W Hotel Brickell se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión única de música electrónica. Disfruta del set especial de Stef Iracet y Zeta Bosio, donde el legendario bajista de Soda Stereo se une a la talentosa DJ argentina para una noche mágica en Full Moon Sessions, el nuevo programa de Chicas Guapas TV. Dejate llevar por los beats, la energía del público y las impresionantes vistas de la ciudad mientras celebramos la música en un ambiente exclusivo.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: ELIAS DOSUNMU - EL CHEF UCRANIANO MÁS VIRAL
programme.desc:
En este súper episodio conocemos un poco más acerca de Elias Dosunmu, inmigrante ucraniano y chef del momento. Con más de 15 millones en sus redes sociales nos cuenta cómo fueron sus comienzos y cómo se prepara para la próxima apertura de su propio restaurante en Madrid: PECADOS.
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: IVANNA ICARDI HABLA DE COSAS INESPERADAS
programme.desc:
Ivanna Icardi es reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en televisión, específicamente en el mundo de los realities, donde ha participado en varios incluyendo algunos de Argentina, España e Italia. Además de ser la hermana del futbolista Mauro Icardi, en este episodio hablamos sobre su carrera, su familia y sobretodo también su futuro laboral: Ivana se ha lanzado como cantante solista!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: MERAKIO - EL QUE SE RÍE PIERDE
programme.desc:
En este episodio vino el creador de contenido Merakio a contarnos cómo es vivir de las redes sociales, qué es lo que más le preocupa y qué planes tiene para su futuro. Capítulo con muchas risas aseguradas. No olvides suscribirte!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: LUANA FIGUEREDO - LA FIGURA EMERGENTE DE LA ESCENA ARGENTINA
programme.desc:
Conocimos a la artista argentina Luana Figueredo, conversamos sobre su carrera, su futuro y además nos deleitó con su voz. Estamos seguros de que su talento la llevará a cruzar todas las fronteras.
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: JAVIER BRICHETTO - EL REY DE LA CARNE ARGENTINA EN ESPAÑA
programme.desc:
Qué divertido e interesante hablar con Javier Brichetto, embajador de la Marca Pais Argentina en España y dueño de los restaurantes Piantao. Conocido por su excelencia gastronómica, hoy exploramos un poco más acerca de su carrera y su futuro.

programme.title: Ed Young Ministries
programme.desc: The Wolf of Wokeism, a neo-Paganistic, neo-Marxist system, is vying for our families across this great nation. Every day, we must fight for the health and safety of our kids. But how do we slay this beast that, at times, seems so innocent while it devours the country's moral fabric? In this talk, Pastors Ed and Lisa Young prepare us for battle, giving us practical handles on building our kids' lives on a biblical, Christ-centered worldview. We’ll discover that when we confront the Wolf of Wokeism with God’s truth, it wilts before our eyes. From victory, we praise our loving Good Shepherd, who will lead us to the greatness of God’s will.

programme.title: Lift Up Jesus
programme.desc: Pastor Dudley Rutherford guides us through Colossians 3:12–17, calling it one of the most valuable chapters in the entire Bible

programme.title: Dr. Jack Graham
programme.desc: Dr. Jack Graham discusses how Jesus changed history and we have to make a decision, is He who He said he was?

programme.title: Ed Young Ministries
programme.desc: When you're asleep, you don't know you're sleeping until you're awake — since we spend 1/3 of our lives sleeping, we have a lot of waking up to do! In this message, Pastor Ed Young teaches that ideas have consequences — deceptive or dire ideas have destructive effects. We learn that Wokeism is a bad idea, and we must wake up to its aftermath, which originates with the enemy himself. And we’ll discover that life fires on all cylinders when we wake up to knowing the Lord. Are you woke yet still in slumber, or genuinely awake?

programme.title: Guest Michael Harris
programme.desc: Tanya Hart speaks with actors, recording artists, and creatives in the entertainment industry.

programme.title: Guest Erick Sermon
programme.desc: Erick Sermon is half of the legendary Hip-Hop duo EPMD and also an incredible producer who’s worked with Kanye, Dr. Dre and more. We talk about making music with both Kanye and Dre, the rise of EPMD, the breakup of EPMD, and stories from a life in Hip-Hop. Amazing convo with an icon.

programme.title: September 10, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for September 10, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a daily video message encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: The Crew talks Creed III, Hip-Hop at 50, and Minority Health Month
programme.desc: The crew takes a closer look at Creed III, reminisce on their fondest Hip-Hop memories and discuss the importance of a healthy lifestyle.

programme.title: Guest Be My Fiasco
programme.desc: Be My Fiasco joins the show to talk about her new album, “Pretty Little Love.”

programme.title: Guest Roy Wood Jr. - City Limits
programme.desc: Comedian Roy Wood Jr. talks fatherhood, performing at the White House Correspondents' Dinner, and his new show, Tribulations. He also speaks on the current state of Hip-Hop and why we need each other.

programme.title: Guest Bryant Terry
programme.desc: Bryant Terry is a chef as well as an artist and a food justice activist. If you love great vegan food, he is the man.

programme.title: Eating Our Way To Extinction
programme.desc: Narrated by Kate Winslet, this film asks: Will our own species go extinct due to our own actions?

programme.title: Life-extending, Anti-Aging Talk
programme.desc: NY Times bestselling author Dr. Michael Greger reveals... How Not to Age. Wouldn't you like to know?

programme.title: Called to Rescue
programme.desc: A mesmerizing look at the lives of farm animals as experienced through the lens of their caregivers.

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: A supernatural stalker pursues a super model to steal her soul with his demonic camera...

programme.title: The Mermaid's Curse
programme.desc: A young man falls in love with a seductive, sultry, young woman he meets on the beach. The more he falls for her, the more he will learn the dangers of falling in love with a siren...

programme.title: Ditch Day
programme.desc: Jenny Bilson, a high school senior, is the perfect student, a wonderful daughter to a veteran police detective and an all American Dream. But the one mistake she is unaware of making is about to haunt her in a very violent way, as her past returns for revenge...

programme.title: Ana
programme.desc: Dos hombres roban una muñeca de un museo que, sin saberlo, abre una puerta al Infierno...

programme.title: Alfredo
programme.desc: Brendan Cobbs, un famoso novelista, es enviado a una remota cabaña de la Inglaterra rural en busca de inspiración para su próxima novela. Cree haber encontrado su próximo tema cuando se encuentra con Alfred, un muñeco del tamaño de un niño que puede cobrar vida. Pero surgen consecuencias mortales cuando Brendan se da cuenta de que Alfred tiene intención de matar.

programme.title: Hotel Dinosaurio
programme.desc: Sienna está desesperada por ganar un gran premio en metálico en un concurso secreto clandestino, pero los dinosaurios comienzan a cazarla para entretenimiento de los ricos y adinerados. ¿Podrá ser la última en sobrevivir a la horrible noche para ganar el premio?

programme.title: Abrazos No, Balazos
programme.desc: Un hombre es injustamente acusado y encarcelado por 20 años por engaño de su esposa, quien lo acusó falsamente de un crimen. Tras su liberación, el hombre buscará venganza contra su ex esposa y aquellos que lo traicionaron.

programme.title: El Inocente
programme.desc: Un grupo de empresarios se dedican a negocios de bienes y raíces para tapar sus negocios chuecos del narcotráfico. La policía local andan pisándole los talones, pero no tienen pruebas para meterlos a la cárcel. Los enemigos de los empresarios quienes también andan el mismo negocio, entran a sus zonas de ellos para quedarse con todo el territorio. Los empresarios quitan a sus enemigos del camino y para cuando la policía piensa de ya que tienen la pruebas necesarios, se darán cuentan que nos las tienen gracias a uno de sus agentes encubiertos de ellos mismos quien ayuda a los empresarios por que le salvaron la vida.

programme.title: El Ultimo Cartucho
programme.desc: Dos hermanos pistoleros enemigos de las injusticias se reúnen una vez más para salvar una tribu de nativos americanos a los cuales les quieren quitar sus tierras y despojarlos de todas sus pertenencias.

programme.title: Cartero
programme.desc: Hernán Sosa es un joven tímido que viene del interior a la ciudad. En su pueblo siempre estuvo enamorado de una chica inalcanzable, Yanina. Hernán consigue trabajo en el correo. Durante el reparto, Hernán descubre que Yanina se encuentra en la ciudad, en la zona de su reparto. En consecuencia, comienza a desplegar sus nuevos conocimientos de cartero para llegar hasta ella. Pero a medida que se acerca, descubre que unos viejos carteros están organizando un robo en el mismo edificio donde trabaja Yanina. Envalentonado por la fuerza del amor, Hernán se enfrentará a los peligros que rodean a Yanina para llegar a declararle lo que siente.

programme.title: Vidas Violentas
programme.desc: integrada por seis cortometrajes escritos y dirigidos por seis de los más connotados directores mexicanos, la película fue realizada y dirigida para concientizar y reducir la violencia de género, el acoso escolar en las escuelas y la violencia doméstica. Proviene de una iniciativa del gobierno en el marco de la campaña basta no violencia

programme.title: The Juniors y La Formula Imperial
programme.desc: Narra las vidas de 7 adolescentes millonarios que se aventuran a planificar una revolución social, generada por vídeo-escándalos y experimentos médicos, con el objetivo de generar un cambio en la ideología mundial, el conflicto entre las clases sociales y el enfrentamiento con sus muchachas de servicio doméstico.

programme.title: Mi Pequeña Pesadilla
programme.desc: Después de la terrible experiencia y la pérdida de sus amigos, Heather se ve obligada a regresar al Hotel Fear donde Travis se prepara para sus próximas víctimas. Heather debe luchar una vez más.

programme.title: The God Of Already
programme.desc: God already sees you for who you truly are. In “The God Of Already,” Pastor Steven teaches us that God’s plan for our lives is closer than we realize.

programme.title: The God Of After
programme.desc: It’s time to get ready. In “The God Of After,” Pastor Steven Furtick reveals that the attack you’re facing is proof of the purpose on your life.

programme.title: The God Of A Way
programme.desc: Don’t get stuck in this season. In “The God of A Way,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that with God, there’s always a way through whatever you’re facing.

programme.title: The God Of Answers
programme.desc: In “The God Of Answers,” Pastor Holly Furtick teaches us how to focus on the instructions God has given us while we wait for the promises He has planned for us next.

programme.title: Running For A Reason
programme.desc: Our expectation of God must not be that there will never be anything chasing us in life but that we are chosen while we are chased. In “Running For A Reason,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that even though God has placed something significant in us, certain development can only happen in the caves of our lives.
